## Overview

This guide provides resources for maintaining consistent visual identity across Rashid Lab presentations, publications, and software. Our branding incorporates UNC Chapel Hill's official colors alongside lab-specific design elements.

## UNC Institutional Branding

We operate within UNC's institutional branding framework. Always refer to official guidelines:

- [UNC Gillings School of Global Public Health Brand Guide](https://sph.unc.edu/resource-pages/communications-and-marketing/brand-resources/)
- [UNC Lineberger Comprehensive Cancer Center Branding](https://unclineberger.org/communications/)
- [UNC Chapel Hill Brand Guide](https://brand.unc.edu/)

## Primary Colors

Our designs use Carolina Blue as the primary accent with Navy for text and headers:

| Color | Hex | Usage |
|-------|-----|-------|
| Carolina Blue | `#4B9CD3` | Primary accent, links |
| Navy | `#13294B` | Headers, text |
| Hyperlink Blue | `#007FAE` | Interactive elements |
| White | `#FFFFFF` | Backgrounds |
| Light Gray | `#F8F9FA` | Secondary backgrounds |

## Lab Identity

The Rashid Lab focuses on Bayesian methods for clinical trials and cancer genomics. Our visual identity reflects:

- **Precision** - Clean, minimalist design
- **Academic rigor** - Professional typography
- **UNC affiliation** - Carolina Blue integration
- **Accessibility** - High contrast, readable fonts
